# Admissions

## Document Information
- **Category:** admissions
- **Lastupdated:** 2025-10-17
- **Academicyear:** 2025-26

## Undergraduate

### Btech

#### Eligibility
- **Qualification:** 10+2 with PCM (Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics)
- **Minimummarks:** 50% aggregate (45% for reserved categories)

##### Subjects
- Physics
- Chemistry
- Mathematics

#### Entranceexams

**Item 1:**
- **Exam:** JEE Main
- **Acceptedscores:** All India ranks
- **Weight:** Primary consideration

**Item 2:**
- **Exam:** TNEA
- **Acceptedscores:** Tamil Nadu state ranks
- **Weight:** For TN students

**Item 3:**
- **Exam:** KARE Entrance Test
- **Acceptedscores:** University-specific
- **Weight:** Alternative option

#### Programs
- Computer Science & Engineering
- AI & Data Science
- Cyber Security
- Electronics & Communication
- Electrical & Electronics
- Mechanical Engineering
- Civil Engineering
- Chemical Engineering
- Biomedical Engineering
- Biotechnology
- Food Technology
- Automobile Engineering

### Bsc

#### Eligibility
- **Qualification:** 10+2 with relevant subjects
- **Minimummarks:** 50% aggregate

#### Programs
- Physics
- Chemistry
- Mathematics
- Biotechnology
- Computer Science

### Bba

#### Eligibility
- **Qualification:** 10+2 in any stream
- **Minimummarks:** 50% aggregate

### Bca

#### Eligibility
- **Qualification:** 10+2 with Mathematics
- **Minimummarks:** 50% aggregate

## Postgraduate

### Mtech

#### Eligibility
- **Qualification:** B.Tech/B.E. in relevant branch
- **Minimummarks:** 55% aggregate (50% for reserved)

#### Entranceexams

**Item 1:**
- **Exam:** GATE
- **Preferred:** True

**Item 2:**
- **Exam:** KARE Entrance Test
- **Alternative:** True

#### Programs
- CSE
- VLSI Design
- Power Electronics
- Structural Engineering
- Thermal Engineering
- Communication Systems
- Embedded Systems

### Mba

#### Eligibility
- **Qualification:** Any bachelor's degree
- **Minimummarks:** 50% aggregate

#### Entranceexams
- CAT
- MAT
- TANCET
- KARE Entrance Test

#### Specializations
- Finance
- Marketing
- Human Resources
- Operations Management
- IT Management

### Msc

#### Eligibility
- **Qualification:** B.Sc in relevant subject
- **Minimummarks:** 55% aggregate

#### Programs
- Physics
- Chemistry
- Mathematics
- Biotechnology
- Data Science

### Mca

#### Eligibility
- **Qualification:** Bachelor's degree with Mathematics
- **Minimummarks:** 50% aggregate

#### Entranceexams
- TANCET
- KARE Entrance Test

## Doctoral

### Phd

#### Eligibility
- **Qualification:** Master's degree in relevant field
- **Minimummarks:** 55% aggregate

#### Entranceexams
- NET
- GATE
- KARE Research Entrance Test

#### Domains
- Engineering (all branches)
- Science (Physics, Chemistry, Math, Bio)
- Management

#### Duration
- **Fulltime:** 3-5 years
- **Parttime:** 4-6 years

## Applicationprocess

### Steps

**Item 1:**
- **Step:** 1
- **Action:** Visit website
- **Url:** www.klu.ac.in/admissions
- **Description:** Access online application portal

**Item 2:**
- **Step:** 2
- **Action:** Register
- **Description:** Create account with email and mobile

**Item 3:**
- **Step:** 3
- **Action:** Fill application
- **Description:** Enter personal, academic, and entrance exam details

**Item 4:**
- **Step:** 4
- **Action:** Upload documents
- **Description:** Scan and upload all required documents

**Item 5:**
- **Step:** 5
- **Action:** Pay application fee
- **Amount:** Rs. 1,000

##### Modes
- Online payment
- Demand Draft

**Item 6:**
- **Step:** 6
- **Action:** Submit application
- **Description:** Review and submit the form

**Item 7:**
- **Step:** 7
- **Action:** Download acknowledgment
- **Description:** Save application number for future reference

### Applicationfee
- **Amount:** 1000
- **Currency:** INR

#### Paymentmodes
- Credit Card
- Debit Card
- Net Banking
- UPI
- Demand Draft

## Requireddocuments
- 10th mark sheet and certificate
- 12th mark sheet and certificate
- Transfer Certificate (TC)
- Conduct Certificate
- Migration Certificate (if applicable)
- Entrance exam scorecard (JEE/GATE/CAT/etc.)
- Degree certificate (for PG admissions)
- Passport size photographs (6 copies)
- Aadhar card copy
- Community certificate (if applicable)
- Income certificate (for scholarship)
- Medical fitness certificate

## Documentsubmissionrequirements

### Ugstudents
- **Title:** Document Submission Requirements for UG Students (1st Year)
- **Submissiontime:** At the time of joining college
- **Mandatory:** Yes

#### Documents

**Item 1:**
- **Serialno:** 1
- **Documentname:** 10th mark sheet
- **Copies:** Original + 3 Xerox copies
- **Mandatory:** True

**Item 2:**
- **Serialno:** 2
- **Documentname:** 11th (TN state board) / 12th mark sheet
- **Copies:** Original + 3 Xerox copies
- **Mandatory:** True
- **Note:** Applicable for Tamil Nadu State Board students

**Item 3:**
- **Serialno:** 3
- **Documentname:** Intermediate Mark Statement (Andhra / Telangana State Board)
- **Copies:** Original + 3 Xerox copies
- **Mandatory:** True

###### Subcategories
- Short Memo
- Long Memo
- **Note:** For students from Andhra Pradesh and Telangana State Boards

**Item 4:**
- **Serialno:** 4
- **Documentname:** Transfer Certificate
- **Copies:** Original + 1 Xerox copy
- **Mandatory:** True

**Item 5:**
- **Serialno:** 5
- **Documentname:** Conduct Certificate
- **Copies:** Original + 1 Xerox copy
- **Mandatory:** True

**Item 6:**
- **Serialno:** 6
- **Documentname:** Medical Fitness Certificate
- **Copies:** Original
- **Mandatory:** True

**Item 7:**
- **Serialno:** 7
- **Documentname:** Community Certificate
- **Copies:** 1 Xerox copy
- **Mandatory:** False
- **Condition:** Only if BC/MBC/SC/ST category

**Item 8:**
- **Serialno:** 8
- **Documentname:** Passport size photograph
- **Copies:** 4 copies
- **Mandatory:** True
- **Specifications:** Recent passport size photos

**Item 9:**
- **Serialno:** 9
- **Documentname:** Family photograph
- **Copies:** 2 copies
- **Mandatory:** True
- **Specifications:** Postcard size

**Item 10:**
- **Serialno:** 10
- **Documentname:** Aadhar Card Xerox
- **Copies:** 1 Xerox Copy
- **Mandatory:** True

**Item 11:**
- **Serialno:** 11
- **Documentname:** Entrance Examination Score Card
- **Copies:** 1 Xerox Copy
- **Mandatory:** False

###### Examples
- JEE Mains
- Any other entrance exam
- **Condition:** If applicable

## Importantdates

### 2025
- **Applicationstart:** December 2024
- **Applicationend:** June 2025
- **Entranceexams:** April - May 2025
- **Counseling:** June - July 2025
- **Admissionstart:** July 2025
- **Classesbegin:** August 2025

## Selectionprocess

### Criteria
- Entrance exam score (primary)
- Academic performance (10th & 12th)
- Personal interview (for some programs)
- Group discussion (for MBA)
- **Meritlist:** Published on official website
- **Counseling:** Online and offline options available

## Reservationpolicy

### Categories

**Item 1:**
- **Category:** SC
- **Reservation:** 15%

**Item 2:**
- **Category:** ST
- **Reservation:** 7.5%

**Item 3:**
- **Category:** OBC
- **Reservation:** 27%

**Item 4:**
- **Category:** EWS
- **Reservation:** 10%
- **Notes:** As per Government of India norms

## Contact

### Admissionsoffice

#### Phone
- +91 4563 289 042
- +91 4563 289 043
- **Email:** admissions@klu.ac.in
- **Timings:** 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM (Mon-Fri), 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM (Sat)

### Helpdesk
- **Email:** admissions.helpdesk@klu.ac.in
- **Phone:** +91 4563 289 000

## Notes
- Admissions are purely merit-based
- Eligibility criteria may change annually
- Check official website for latest updates
- Early application recommended
- Incomplete applications will be rejected
- Document verification mandatory before admission

## Documentsubmissionguidelines

### Importantinstructions
- All documents must be submitted at the time of joining college
- Original documents are required for verification
- Xerox copies must be clear and legible
- Community certificate required only for BC/MBC/SC/ST students
- Entrance exam scorecards required if applicable
- Medical fitness certificate must be from a registered medical practitioner

### Photospecifications

#### Passportsize
- **Quantity:** 4
- **Requirements:** Recent passport size photographs with clear face visibility

#### Familyphoto
- **Quantity:** 2
- **Size:** Postcard size
- **Requirements:** Family photograph including student

### Statespecificrequirements

#### Tamilnadu
- **Requirement:** 11th and 12th mark sheets for TN State Board students

#### Andhratelangana
- **Requirement:** Intermediate Mark Statement with both Short Memo and Long Memo

### Checklist

#### Beforesubmission
- Verify all documents are original with required xerox copies
- Check photograph quality and quantity
- Ensure Aadhar card xerox is clear
- Get medical fitness certificate from registered doctor
- Arrange community certificate if applicable
- Keep entrance exam scorecards ready

### Submissionprocess
- **When:** At the time of joining college
- **Where:** Admissions Office
- **Contact:** admissions@klu.ac.in or +91 4563 289 042
